summary: Give more alteration spells like ironflesh or ebonyflesh
descriptionHtml:
Whwn you play like a mage and to defend yourself with alteration spells there are only few of them so i decided to make more ... I took idea from armors and give the most possible similar to their original. 
These are the \"flesh\" spells. 

Leatherflesh:
Armor 52

ironflesh:
Armor 80
fortify stamina 25

elvenflesh:
Armor 85

dwarvenflesh:
Armor 90
night vision

steelflesh:
Armor 90
health +30

ebonyflesh:
Armor 100
muffle

glassflesh:
Armor 103


orischflesh:
Armor 136

daedricflesh:
Armor 200
fort. carry weight +30
magicka, health, stamina +50

dragonflesh:
Armor 250
health, magicka, stamina regenerate rate +80%
magicka, health, stamina +80

I removed the stoneflesh.
You can fiind them in a chest in the bannered mare (you must steal them) or buy it from farengal in witherun.
author: Peter1111
